name: Tenochtitlan, the Rain Temple DEMO
description:
Tenochtitlan, the Rain Temple DEMO, is an Adventure dungeon crawler based on the ancient Aztec legends. The Rain Temple is build in the honor of the Aztec God of Rain, Tlaloc. 

The Rain Temple is one of many temples and shrines buried in Tenochtitlan, the Capital City of the Aztec Empire.  

Tenochtitlan was laid out symmetrically, with four sectors separated by four causeways or canals surrounding the central area. This central area was where the temple of Tlaloc and temples for other gods, and the rulers’ palaces lay.

Templo Mayor(the Rain Temple) precinct was the location in which the Aztec practiced both bloodletting and human sacrifice.

Escape the Rain Temple by solving puzzles and defeating enemies.

Mentor : Dominik Cvetkovski

Game Designer & Programmer : Ivan Trtanj
